definition: extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
length (of a piece of writing)/space occupied on a printed page
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
size (i.e. area) of a country, geographical region or school campus etc/(fig.) scope/extent

sentences.english: Long streamers hung from the tops of tall buildings.
sentences.chinese: 長幅標語從高高的樓頂上垂掛下來。

sentences.english: This book includes 80 color illustrations, which were drawn by Ah Gui, a famous cartoonist.
sentences.chinese: 本書配有80幅彩色插圖，繪製者爲著名漫畫家阿桂。

sentences.english: A book called Animal Locomotion collected 781 of these plates.
sentences.chinese: 《動物步態》一書收集了781幅類似的照片。

sentences.english: In July, Mandi 's collection including seventeen paintings will show you the spirit of contract.
sentences.chinese: 七月，契約之展，由壹霖的這十七幅作品逐一呈現。

sentences.english: Yarn is a general term for long pieces of interlocked fibers.
sentences.chinese: 紗是互鎖纖維長幅的總稱。

sentences.english: What a picture Rembrandt would have made of him!
sentences.chinese: “要是讓倫勃朗來畫他一定是幅傑作”。

sentences.english: Rofl, I bet that was a sight.
Seven of his works were shown in 'the First Exhibition of Yifeng Society'.
sentences.chinese: 作品7幅參加“藝風社第一屆展覽會”。

sentences.english: This paper has 21 figures, 5 tables and 15 references.
sentences.chinese: 本論文包括圖21幅，表5個，參考文獻15篇。

sentences.english: Here, a favela in Rio de Janeiro is transformed by dozens of images.
sentences.chinese: 幾十幅圖像改變了里約熱內盧的貧民區形象。

sentences.english: Li Gongming will both have 60 photography works exhibited in this show.
sentences.chinese: 本次展出顧錚和李公明的攝影作品各60幅。

sentences.english: From afar, like a static painting, forever in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠望去，像幅靜止的油畫，久久地印在我的心裏。

sentences.english: At present, the gourd sheets of different types of works created tens of thousands of pieces.
sentences.chinese: 目前，葫蘆張已創作不同類型的作品數萬幅。

sentences.english: My computer's got a skull and crossbones on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 我的電腦屏幕上有幅骷髏圖。

sentences.english: The 105-copy limited edition of 'Chunjiang Lianhai (River in Spring Flowing to Sea)' was published.
sentences.chinese: 《春江連海》有限印刷105幅出版發行。

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
portrait (painting, photo etc)/(in a general sense) representation of a person/likeness
